data.name: def_AutoHideInfo
data.value: AspNetPager is hidden because there're only one page of data and AlwaysShow is set to false

data.name: cat_PageIndexBox
data.value: PageIndexBox and submit button.

data.name: cat_Navigation
data.value: Navigation

data.name: cat_Paging
data.value: Paging

data.name: def_CloneFromTypeError
data.value: The control "%controlID%" does not exist or is not of type Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager!

data.name: def_InvalidPIErrorMsg
data.value: Invalid page index!

data.name: def_NavigationToolTipTextFormatString
data.value: Go to page {0}

data.name: def_PIOutOfRangeMsg
data.value: Page index out of range!

data.name: desc_AlwaysShow
data.value: Always display the control even if there's only one page. By default, AspNetPager will only render a line of comment when the total number of records to be paged less than or equal to the PageSize value.

data.name: desc_AspNetPager
data.value: Asp.net custom paging control.

data.name: desc_ButtonImageAlign
data.value: Image button alignment.

data.name: desc_ButtonImageExtension
data.value: File extension of images used as paging buttons.

data.name: desc_ButtonImageNameExtension
data.value: Image file name extension.

data.name: desc_CloneFrom
data.value: Clone the values of properties and events headle from anthor AspNetPager control

data.name: desc_CpiButtonImageNameExtension
data.value: Image file name extension for the current page index button

data.name: desc_CssClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the AspNetPager control.

data.name: desc_CurrentPageButtonClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the current page button.

data.name: desc_CurrentPageButtonStyle
data.value: CSS styles applied to the current page button.

data.name: desc_CurrentPageIndex
data.value: The index of the current page.

data.name: desc_CustomInfoClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the custom information section.

data.name: desc_CustomInfoHTML
data.value: The HTML text to be shown on the custom information section.

data.name: desc_CustomInfoSectionWidth
data.value: The width of the custom information section.

data.name: desc_CustomInfoStyle
data.value: Style of the custom information section.

data.name: desc_CustomInfoTextAlign
data.value: The alignment of the text shown on the custom information section.

data.name: desc_DisabledButtonImageNameExtension
data.value: Image file name extension for the disabled buttons.

data.name: desc_EnableUrlWriting
data.value: Whether to use url rewriting technology.

data.name: desc_FirstPageText
data.value: The text to be used on the first page button.

data.name: desc_ImagePath
data.value: File path for images used as navigation buttons.

data.name: desc_PageIndexBoxClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the page index box

data.name: desc_PageIndexBoxStyle
data.value: CSS styles applied to the page index box

data.name: desc_InvalidPIErrorMsg
data.value: Error message to be displayed at the client when the page index user entered into the page index box is invalid(not a number).

data.name: desc_LastPageText
data.value: The text to be used on the last page button.

data.name: desc_MoreButtonType
data.value: The type of more .. button. The values are Text and Image.

data.name: desc_NavigationButtonType
data.value: The type of the the first, last, previous and next buttons. The values are Text and Image.

data.name: desc_NavigationToolTipTextFormatString
data.value: The formatting to be applied to the navigation tooltip, for example "go to page {0}".

data.name: desc_NBTFormatString
data.value: The formatting to be applied to the text on the numeric paging buttons

data.name: desc_NextPageText
data.value: The text to be used on the next page button.

data.name: desc_NumericButtonCount
data.value: Number of numeric paging buttons to show

data.name: desc_NumericButtonType
data.value: The type of the numeric paging buttons.The values are Text and Image

data.name: desc_PageSize
data.value: Number of records to display per page

data.name: desc_PagingButtonSpacing
data.value: The spacing between paging buttons.

data.name: desc_PagingButtonType
data.value: The type of the paging buttons. The values are Text and Image.

data.name: desc_PIOutOfRangeMsg
data.value: Error message displayed at the client when the page index user entered into the input box out of range(either greater than the maximum page index or less than 1)

data.name: desc_PrevPageText
data.value: The text to be used on the previous page button.

data.name: desc_RecordCount
data.value: Total number of records to be paged.

data.name: desc_ShowCustomInfoSection
data.value: Display mode of the custom information section.The values are Never, Left and Right.

data.name: desc_ShowDisabledButtons
data.value: Whether or not to show disabled navigation buttons.

data.name: desc_ShowFirstLast
data.value: Whether or not to show the first and the last page buttons.

data.name: desc_ShowNavigationToolTip
data.value: whether or not to show tooltip when the mouse moves over navigation buttons.

data.name: desc_ShowPageIndex
data.value: Whether or not to show numeric paging buttons.

data.name: desc_ShowPrevNext
data.value: Whether or not to show previous and next page buttons.

data.name: desc_SubmitButtonClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the submit button.

data.name: desc_SubmitButtonStyle
data.value: CSS styles applied to the submit button.

data.name: desc_SubmitButtonText
data.value: Submit button text.

data.name: desc_TextAfterPageIndexBox
data.value: Text after the page index box.

data.name: desc_TextBeforePageIndexBox
data.value: Text before the page index box.

data.name: desc_UrlPageIndexName
data.value: The parameter name of the current page index to be transfered via url when using Url Paging.

data.name: desc_UrlPaging
data.value: Whether to use url paging by transfering paging information from url parameter.

data.name: desc_UrlRewritePattern
data.value: The formatting of the url to be rewritten to, using %paramName% to represent the value of url parameter "paramName".

data.name: desc_LayoutType
data.value: Layout type of the paging control, can be Table or Div

data.name: desc_SubmitButtonImageUrl
data.value: Submit button image path

data.name: desc_UrlPageSizeName
data.value: Url parameter name of PageSize property value

data.name: desc_AlwaysShowFirstLastPageNumber
data.value: Whether or not to always show the first and the last page number

data.name: desc_FirstLastButtonsClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the first and the last page buttons

data.name: desc_FirstLastButtonsStyle
data.value: CSS styles applied to the first and the last page buttons

data.name: desc_MoreButtonsClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the more page buttons

data.name: desc_MoreButtonsStyle
data.value: CSS styles applied to the more page buttons

data.name: desc_NavigationButtonsPosition
data.value: Navigation buttons (first,last,next and previous) position

data.name: desc_PageIndexBoxType
data.value: The type of the page index box,can be DropDownList or input box

data.name: desc_PagingButtonLayoutType
data.value: Layout type of the paging elements,can be wrapped into <li> or <span> tags

data.name: desc_PagingButtonsClass
data.value: CSS class applied to all paging buttons

data.name: desc_PagingButtonsStyle
data.value: CSS styles applied to all paging buttons

data.name: desc_PrevNextButtonsClass
data.value: CSS class name applied to the previous and the next page buttons

data.name: desc_PrevNextButtonsStyle
data.value: CSS styles applied to the previous and the next page buttons

data.name: desc_ShowBoxThreshold
data.value: The minimum page number to show page index box when the value of PageIndexBoxType property is set to Auto

data.name: desc_ShowMoreButtons
data.value: Whether or not to show more page buttons

data.name: desc_ShowPageIndexBox
data.value: The display mode of the page index box

data.name: desc_UrlPagingTarget
data.value: The target window or framename name to open new page when use url paging mode

data.name: desc_FirstPageUrlRewritePattern
data.value: The formatting of the first page url to be rewritten to, using %paramName% to represent the value of url parameter "paramName".

data.name: def_CopyrightText
data.value: AspNetPager 7.5.1 Copyright:2003-2015 Webdiyer (en.webdiyer.com)

data.name: def_EmptyCloneFrom
data.value: The property value of CloneFrom cannot be null or empty

data.name: def_RecursiveCloneFrom
data.value: Invalid value for the CloneFrom property, AspNetPager control can not clone itself

data.name: desc_CPBTextFormatString
data.value: The text formatting to be applied to the current page paging button

data.name: desc_CurrentPageButtonPosition
data.value: The position of the current page paging button

data.name: desc_ReverseUrlPageIndex
data.value: Whether or not the url page index is reversed when in url paging mode

data.name: desc_BackImageUrl
data.value: The URL of the background image for the AspNetPager control.

data.name: desc_HorizontalAlign
data.value: The horizontal alignment of the paging buttons within the AspNetPager control.
